PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-04992003-04-08,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY, 
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry of PETER ARMSTRONG of Vancouver, British Columbia, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Craig Farrell, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
